content:
EXCLUSIVE GROUP RATES FOR WAIKIKI

Meetings & Events

While Aqua Waikiki Pearl does not currently offer meeting space, we do offer exclusive group travel rates that will help you save on your Hawaii getaway. Whether you're planning a corporate retreat, athletic event, or family reunion, our group travel program can arrange special hotel rates for groups seeking 10 or more rooms at our boutique Waikiki hotel.

Request for Proposal
